name: XQuery: XQueryVersionCheck
description: This quality rule reports modules without a XQuery version number or with an invalid XQuery version. Valid versions considered are "1.0-ml", "1.0", "3.0" and "3.1"
output: Associated to each artifact with violations, the Quality Rule provides: - The number of violation patterns - Bookmarks for violation patterns found in source code.
rationale: For better compatibility of code after server upgrades and consistent behavior in XQuery processing, declare the latest XQuery version (1.0-ml/3.1), instead of declaring an older version - 0.9-ml - or not declaring a version at all
remediation: Declare a valid XQuery version for each module
